website_summaries.verdict: An affordable every day cleanser that's gentle on rosacea ridden skin.
pros: This creamy formula keeps skin well moisturized
The pump style bottle is convenient and easy to use
The cleanser starts clearing up dry, itchy red patches within the first week of use
Gentle formula doesn't further irritate rosacea, and with regular use will reduce overall redness, giving you a smooth, even skin tone
This product also sits at a reasonably low price point
cons: Product has a strong chemical smell
Luckily it doesn't linger on the skin

customer_reviews.title: Burns!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this for my sensitive skin. I liked the hydrating consistency but immediately after using this my skin started burning like crazy!! It’s red, blotchy, and a bit inflamed. It’s still stinging! I see some other people had this reaction too. What is causing this??
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: So ultra gentle that it doesn't remove makeup at all.
customer_reviews.text: So ultra gentle that it doesn't remove makeup at all. Wet face, pumped cleanser on hands, rubbed into my face thoroughly, rinsed face, grabbed towel to dry off... Face full of makeup on my towel. Washed a second time and flipped the towel over to dry my face on the other side... More makeup on the towel. I guess my face doesn't feel dried out and that's a good thing but... Really the main purpose of this is to remove the makeup and it doesn't so.
customer_reviews.author: Three Dog Circus

customer_reviews.title: Something in it aggravated my eczema I do not recommend if you are are suffering from this condition
customer_reviews.text: Something in it aggravated my eczema I do not recommend if you are are suffering from this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy, gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I found this cleanser by watching Dr. Dray videos, she highly recommends this. The ingredients are gentle and it cleans my face well each night (while not stripping my face and making it dry). I do agree with another reviewer on how to use this cleanser. You have to take a pump or two and rub it into your face DRY, no water at first (think of it like a cleansing balm and cleanser in one). Rub it all around, even on your eye make up. Then, with lukewarm water, wash it all off. All my makeup and greasiness from the day come off, yet my skin still feels supple.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Rynties

customer_reviews.title: Just awful
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this a try for something different. I have good skin. I have been using this face wash off and on for a few weeks. I noticed bumps on my eyelids a few days ago so I thought I should wash more often. The bumps are now all over my face and my whole face is burning. After reading reviews, I will be throwing this out. Very dissatisfied and my skin is a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin, and am allergic to many facial products, including many labeled hypoallergenic, and for sensitive skin. This cleanser is fantastic. It removes make-up, but leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. Best of all, I'm not allergic to it. Thanks, Neutrogena!
customer_reviews.author: DiggerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin burn!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is for sensitive skin it made my skin BURN! I guess some people react to cocamidopropyl betaine - an ingredient commonly found in "sensitive skin" products. On my doctors recommendation, I switched to using the Vanicream Facial Cleanser and I absolutely LOVE it! I've never found a cleanser so good. It's great at removing makeup without having to scrub (even my eye makeup), has no scent or added fragrance, isn't drying and is affordable. If you find you're still reacting tp "sensitive skin" products, it may be the cocamidopropyl betaine...
customer_reviews.author: KittyMac

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend on sensitive skin.  Strong perfume smell.  Immediate burning/ itching reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I used for the first time last night and my face started itching and burning at bedtime. Woke up in the morning with red splotches that weren't there before. I thought I'd try one more time to possibly eliminate it from being the problem, and nope. My entire face and hairline is irritated and itching. I only have semi- sensitive skin so I definitely would not recommend to someone with extremely sensitive skin. Also very perfume smelling.
customer_reviews.author: GinaLC

customer_reviews.title: Comparison
customer_reviews.text: The product: my go to face wash does works wonders. Seller: I always get nervous buying this kind of stuff from amazon but the procedure is real. Left photo is my old and right photo is my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 stuff without an overwhelming, cloyingly noxious perfume sent.
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it is advertised to do: Gently cleanses skin without drying, no harsh, overpowering scent (A+), and easily rinses away without residue or over-drying. I have extremely oily skin, but I am also very sensitive to chemicals. I have to be so careful about products I use. This one is perfect: Does the job; inexpensive; leaves skin clean but not "mask-dry"; and does not create a "rebound" oil flow like so many harsher products.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Lardia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this product. Just recently I've been suffering from dry, itchy painful skin on my face. I used to suffer from acne and was worried I would swing back from the dry itchy skin to acne again. That hasn't been the case at all. I also use the eye makeup remover and moisturizer from Neutrogena. I like the creaminess of the product as well. Just because it doesn't foam does not mean it is a lesser quality.
customer_reviews.author: TammyJ

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan !
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a cheaper option to the sensitive skin face wash I was using, Cetaphil was sold out of there’s on amazon at the time - this is awful! It burns my skin when using. ( not literally but a burning sensation ) I tried to use it as a body wash since it was making my face burn and it also made me body burn as well. It feels harsh. Nothing like other cream or sensitive skin cleansers I’ve used- deff will need to toss in the garbage !
customer_reviews.author: Guy Fieri

customer_reviews.title: Leaves white bumps on face
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this now for a few months before writing a review. Face wash review is hard because everyone’s skin is different- first I did not like the chemical smell of this- it isn’t overtly strong, but it doesn’t smell good. The first few times I used this product it was okay- but now I noticed I have white bumps all over my neck and sides of my face. And this is the only product I have changed recently. It’s moisturizing- but too much. Leaves your face feeling pretty grimy after a few hours. Just a note I have combination skin between dry/oily. Disappointed because I really wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling smooth
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product to remove everyday dirt and grime from your face. It does not dry your face like the sahara desert but leaves it smooth and soft. I recommend anyone using this product to apply moisturizer afterwards. Which should be a given because after stripping your face from oils one should always moisturize with a good quality moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash for affordable price
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a clean face wash with good ingredients and that’s gentle bc I have combo skin and I don’t need anything crazy bc I lack acne besides random pimples. I love this face wash it’s very gentle and cleans your face with moisturizing it as well bc you don’t have that tight “clean” feel after. You feel clean and moisturized. There’s no scent so it’s very nice as well bc I don’t like fragrant face washes. Also love how long this bottle lasts me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Not Gentle
customer_reviews.text: My face didn't like this stuff. I had to go back to Cetaphil which is much more money unfortunately. I was really hoping this was going to work. It left my face red and tight feeling. Now their Hydroboost moisturizer worked well. Even that didn't help after using this face wash. Very disappointed shouldn't have ordered three bottles....
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Scott Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Good gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I started a salicylic acid exfoliator and my face soap was drying me out badly. I was also experiencing breakouts, which was just a terrible combination with my dry areas. I ordered the Neutrogena ultra hydrating cleanser & I like it. It doesn’t have a smell & its light. I didn’t experience sensitivity with this product, but as a cleanser, I wash 2x because I noticed that I still have makeup when I dry with my towel. Overall, its a good product for gentle cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: MarcelTV

customer_reviews.title: Burns my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a gentle moisturizing cleaner to use with some harsh face medications that I was prescribed. This cleaner burns my face. I'm going to go back to using my old Neutrogena cream cleanser because it doesn't hurt my face.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My husband started using my acne face wash with SA, he didnt realize you have to moisturize after it because of how harsh SA can be. He had dry patches all over. I bought him this and a moisturizer and it cleared up the dry patches within a week while still decreasing his oiliness
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy but save your old pump
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the foaming ultra gentle cleanser back in 2018, with the first bottle, the pump didn't work, thought well sometimes defective things happened, used my old pump on bottle. Just opened another bottle, that pump didn't work, hummmmm, a trend is starting to develop, thank goodness the old, old pump was still working, what-a-want-a bet, on the last one, the pump won't work, well that is the way trends work. Trying to save by buying in bulk, got stuck with defective pumps. Sometimes saving works, sometimes a person feels like a sucker. Good cleanser though. Hope my old pump holds up!
customer_reviews.author: once burned

customer_reviews.title: face feels soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: I like Neutrogena products. I'm very pleased with this face wash, almost no scent and my skin loves it. It's very gentle on the skin. I've been using it for a month now and it's my favorite face wash. I have slightly oily skin but in the summer I can get dry patches., this product eliminates the dry patches but doesn't make the oily areas break out. Another terrific product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be water
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser does not appear to do much of anything. As soon as I put it on my face, it instantly runs off. This product cleans my face only slightly better then running it through water does. When in the shower, I still feel the need to utilize my body wash on my face as it does a much better job of cleaning then this product. However, I will say that I have sensitive skin and have had no adverse reactions to the product. Also it is absent of fragrance as advertised, so there’s that too. Overall though, I would say this product is not worth spending money on.
customer_reviews.author: Workout Dutchess

customer_reviews.title: The best there is for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of other products advertise as for sensitive skin, but have some grainy bits that exfoliate. This one is actually soft. Actually takes care of my skin without scratching it. No real smell at all. Doesn't sting unless you get it in your eyes. lol! Doesn't dry your skin out at all. Doesn't moisturize it either. I still use a pea sized amount of light moisturizer after. My skin is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Katrah

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Face Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to give this a try because it was something i was looking for. It says it has no fragrance and it’s non-comedogenic, which is good for acne skin. When it arrived, I tried it and wasn’t happy with the results. It literally feels like you’re washing your face with water because it’s so thin and doesnt feel like it’s cleaning. I even washed my face 3 times in a row but still feels dirty and oily. Some Neutrogena products are good but not this one. I recently been using CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser and works great FOR ME. Not everyone has the same type of skin but CeraVe seems to work on any type.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena NAILED IT with this face wash. I have very sensitive skin due to rosacea and skin allergies. This face wash cleans my face without irritating either of those conditions. My skin feels smooth after I wash it, unlike the dry and tight feeling I got from other face washes. I hope that Neutrogena keeps making this forever - it is a fantastic product for people with highly sensitive skin. Bonus: no fragrance in the creamy version.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for morning cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the morning when I only need to remove my acne medication from the night before, so it’s perfect for that since it’s so gentle and non-drying. I use something that suds and cleans more for makeup removal at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cleanser if you're looking something that's extremely gentle, and doesn't dry out your skin. I have really dry sensitive skin and I bought this to actually used to start Retin-A and it's amazing. Obviously with a cleanser this gentle it's not going to remove your makeup or anything, so I recommend do using something else to remove your makeup first.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, get something else .
customer_reviews.text: This does not lather up at all and doesn't clean my face properly. I have sensitive skin and was looking for an inexpensive alternative to my la Roche cleanser. I didn't want a foam cleanser but this just doesn't so the job at all. Doesn't lather or make my face feel clean, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Seria

customer_reviews.title: My eczema due to frequent hand washing went away
customer_reviews.text: I had a small spot of eczema on my hand due to frequent hand washing during the winter. The eczema went away after I switched to Neutrogena daily facial cleanser for all my hand washing. I also use it this cleanser as a body wash and it does not leave any residue on my shower floor that could cause in a fall. The container is pleasing enough that there is no need to transfer the soap to a decorative container.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Confused by the word “ gentle”
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little confused by this face wash because I’ve heard so many good things but it burns my face when I use it and I started to peel around my nose which also caused inflammation. I did enjoy the amount you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Iliana U.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The scent is good but honestly, I'm not sure it actually cleans your face. I wash my face with this but when I follow up with toner there's so much dirt not he cotton pad, like I didn't wash my face at all. I would prefer my face wash making my face feel like I've actually washed it. This might be too lightweight for me. I'm going to use it because I paid for it and don't feel like returning however I always follow up with toner.
customer_reviews.author: Amariepeace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having flakiness around my nose and scaliness in between my eyes from dry skin, lately. This wash has been amazing at cleaning and hydrating my face. I have paired it with the Neutrogena hyaluronic gel moisturizer and my face is soft and hydrated now. I am looking forward to seeing how these products hold up in the dry winter months!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie G.

customer_reviews.title: Less stripping than water
customer_reviews.text: Somehow this face wash leaves my face feeling better than washing with just water. This stuff is the most gentle face wash I have ever used. There are no suds at all but your skin still gets clean. I tried some other so called gentle washes that still left my face feeling dry. I can use 2 or 3 pumps and my skin still feels so soft after I use it. Highly recommend this face cleanser if you struggle with dry skin or redness or sensitivity of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for tretinoin treated skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I started using it after I began tretinoin treatment as a nightly cleanser, and it works great at removing make-up, sunscreen and other gunk while not stripping my skin of the minimal moisture that it's hanging on to for dear life. It doesn't lather and can take some getting used to, but one pump is more than enough for my entire face. Great for sensitive/dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser for Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and am allergic to most soaps. This has proven to work for me. I only gave it four stars on moisturizing because I really can’t tell.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a dupe for my First Aid Beauty cleanser that I love but costs $20 a tube. So far, I am really enjoying it. It cleans better, actually. It’s only slightly less creamy. Just as gentle on my sensitive skin for a MUCH better price. I’ve already bought a back up bottle for when I run out. There is zero scent and zero tightness to my skin after washing.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist told me to use this cleanser. I've been using it for about 8 years now. It totally cleared up my skin. I have sensitive skin but sometimes get a few breakouts on my chin. Since I've been using this I no longer get breakouts and my skin is soft.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skins with pimple. I actually bought this after watching Dr. Dray's youtube channel. This cleanser has no scent and is soap-free. It is really mild and gives moisturized skins after using it. I highly recommend if you have sensitive skin and do light makeup.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: I went to the dermatologist and she recommended this product. I have to say it is the best for thorough cleansing sensitive skin. I have tried other products but they tend to clog or irritate my skin. This one is completely scent free, non-comedogenic, and is everything great that neutrogena stands for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD CLEANSER
customer_reviews.text: I really love this face cleanser! Originally I was going to by the Cetaphil or CeraVe daily facial cleaners but upon seeing that both contain parabens and other ingredients that are not suitable for the skin. That's when I found this one by neutrogena. The reason why I didn't give it 5 starts is because it doesnt feel moisturized enough which is why I apply a moisturizer after using it. I definitely will reorder this.
customer_reviews.author: Arnav

customer_reviews.title: I have less acne
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the pink dove bar of soap to clean my face per dermatologists recommendations. Well....that was 15 years ago, my skin is now mature, I need something not drying. Since I've started using this face soap my adult acne has GREATLY improved. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: MandaPanda

customer_reviews.title: Very creamy- if that’s what you like then this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: It’s maybe a bit too creamy and too much for sensitive skin; so much so that it doesn’t really remove my makeup when I wash my face. Perhaps that is not the point but that’s what I use my facewash for. I like other neutrogena face washes better.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the foaming one
customer_reviews.text: The foaming formula is 100x better, after 15 seconds of rubbing this on your face, it’s like all your rubbing is water on your face. Almost have to use 3-4 squirts so it doesn’t just dissolve. Won’t buy again honestly. It was only $4 when I bought it on here but for $8 the foaming one is worth it
customer_reviews.author: mildred123

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: the perfect gentle cleanser for the most sensitive skin. I have atopic dermatitis and my skin hates everything. I came to this because cerave moisturizers and vanicream cleanser gave me the worst atopic dermatitis/rosecea flare up...and this helped clear it up. Please never stop making it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yermack

customer_reviews.title: Soap dispenser was open and spilled all over
customer_reviews.text: I was going to do a subscription, but the soap dispenser was open and got all over the box. Also, after looking at the ingredients it is different from the one I have, plus it is distributed by J&J and not Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: HE

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Repeatedly arrives damaged.
customer_reviews.text: A great, refreshing, everyday wash for those with skin allergies and/or really sensitive skin. Unfortunately, shipping and handling practices with Amazon have resulted in many of the products arriving open and/or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like vinegar and burns skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually like Neutrogena products, but this one is disappointing. The smell of this is sour, like vinegar, and like other sensitive-skin reviewers here, it mildly burns my face as well. It also does not seem to do anything to moisturize my face, leaving my skin feeling parched instead.
customer_reviews.author: Miaxara

customer_reviews.title: My Husband loves this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband who has the worst skin sensitivity to facial cleaning products. I decided to take a chance with this product and it's working!! He loves it!! He has not experienced any irritation!! I am the apple of his eye for the luck he has with this product!! Thanks for creating it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for several years. Very effective in removing eye makeup without causing irritation. Doesn’t dry my skin. I put a free drops on wet hands to clean face then use a warm cloth to gently pat eye area and rest of face. Never leaves mascara residue.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: Removed blackheads, smoothed face, but experienced redness and burning sensation first week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product since December and it has worked wonders to my face. I use this along with a prescribed Retin-A gel and my face has never been better. My blackheads are gone on my cheek area and for the most part on my nose and my forehead has cleared. And even if I go a week without the Retin-A, this Neutrogena cleanser still keeps my face clean with only 1-2 blemishes showing up. However, when I first used it, my face would turn red and burn and contemplated stopping the use of this cleanser but after the first week everything went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Wow nice and for Price
customer_reviews.text: why this love is really nice it's a little bit smaller than I thought but it's still a decent sized it cleans my face really well it's soft and is sensitive I don't know why it got bad reviews cuz this stuff is awesome I feel so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Suarez Valerio

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice but strong perfume smell
customer_reviews.text: Good every day wash. Skin feels clean and nice after use. The scent is very strong for me and smells like a strong perfume. I don't smell it much after I apply face moisturizer but is very strong while using the face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Darby123

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, it made my face oily after I’m out of the shower for like 10 minutes. Also if you use it more than 2-3 times a week it’ll burn certain parts of your face and make it look like you have sunburn so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and hairy ewww!
customer_reviews.text: Was just loose in the box with other items. No bag etc. was covered in a long black hair around the nozzle and was oozing out under cap. Tossed in trash with a pair of rubber gloves. Disgusted!
customer_reviews.author: Keri & Kris Penland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Face care!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this facial cleanser for years and buying through Amazon saves me money. Plus the product is exactly what I would buy OTC, but I'd rather pick it up in my mailbox from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: mimscase

customer_reviews.title: Trusted name in skin care
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me, by a medical professional, for use with treatments which are drying and/or irritating to your skin, such as salicylic acid, benzoyl peroxide, or retinoids. Works well in the dry winter air, which further dries my skin, but will have to see what happens come the more humid, summer months ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Queen

customer_reviews.title: Like product it very much...
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. Great price. I'm rating a 4 star because bottle was slightly opened so it spilled inside the box. Bottle was not in a plastic bag. Packaging could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: FESH

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I purchased this due to the fact that I have very sensitive skin and most facial cleansers make me break out worse. This product has no smell, does not lather, and feels like mostly water. It does nothing for your face at all. After use your face still feels dirty as if you used nothing. It does not moisturize. Disappointed will continue my search for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: VERY light gel
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely does NOT remove makeup well. I have to use the other Neutrogena Ultra Gentle foaming cleanser, but unfortunately that other cleanser IS scented. If they would make that unscented, it would be perfect. This hydrating gel cleanser however, does not have a scent, but it is so light that it almost doesn't do anything! For $8 it should at least leave you feeling clean. It might as well just be water with lotion. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Giblin

customer_reviews.title: a mild yet powerful cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is a super cleanser.Its mild yet does the job.Takes all the gunk out .creamy and hydrating and does not clog pores.Suitable for all skin types.Has no severe fragrance and a bomb cleanser
customer_reviews.author: sohini

customer_reviews.title: Effective and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. It's effective and gentle and my skin is happy. No more acne now that I'm using more and more neutrogena products (and quite using mary kay).
customer_reviews.author: monkeymom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face wash; no itch after use.
customer_reviews.text: I seem to be allergic to organic ingredients - the chemicals listed are all the chemicals that do not produce a reaction for me. I have enjoyed this face wash and use it anywhere I was having a problem after washing or using hair products that contained plant products that make me itch!
customer_reviews.author: SCM

customer_reviews.title: Everything I've hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin & I find alot of face wash's leave my skin feeling very oily after i use them. I gave this one a try and i absolutely love it! It does not leave my skin oily and My face feels so clean everytime. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cat T.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult pump
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is 5-star, but I cannot get the pump to function. I tried slowly turning it around, looking for the spot that would allow the pump head to rise, but no luck. What’s the secret?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Not the best at taking off makeup but great for skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this because I have super sensitive skin but it really doesn’t do great on getting makeup off....like it really doesn’t take anything off. I have to use a makeup remover then wash my face with this! Has really helped with keeping acne down.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 10 years now. Twice a day every day. I am fortunate not to have any skin issues. Pair with your favorite moisturizer as it does dry out your skin a little after washing, as do most products. I prefer the FOAMING version compared to the creamy. I also use a face loofa once a day with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing cleaner
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd bottle my wife and I have been using and it is very good. It does not leave you facial skin too dry after use like other products. OF course it does not moisturize your skin like your natural facial oil but it does the work of cleansing and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Minh T.

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed!! Spilled all over my other products!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this bottle is not the size that you would typically get in the store so it’s not really worth the money. I didn’t even get to use this product because it was not sealed properly and it spilled all over other products in my Amazon box. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As simplistic and gentle as it gets: great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: This is literally just a plain, good face wash if you want something non-foaming/ non-sudsy, creamy, hydrating, simplistic, and cheap face wash that will definitely not harm your face in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Nemisa

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Skin!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product! I've been struggling to find a facial cleanser due to my sensitive skin and this actually works! It doesn't dry out my face and is gentle and soft. My skin feels fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very drying/a little irritating
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised how it dried out my face and made it a bit red. I returned this and bought the cetaphyl wash, which I’m very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: popcornfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel clean and soft
customer_reviews.text: This really gets the dirt and grime out of your pores and your face feels very clean after using this for a wash. Doesn't leave me feeling dry afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ch0mpy

customer_reviews.title: Lid broken, what a mess!
customer_reviews.text: There was no plastic seal around where the lid meets the bottle. It had come unscrewed during shipping and the box I received was a soggy mess full of face wash. I lost half of the contents of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser for taking off makeup and sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Its a good cleanser for taking off your make up and sunscreen. It does dry out your skin so I suggest you moisturize after you cleanse. I do the double cleanse and use Neutrogena Hydroboost cleanser then use Thayers Toner before my other skincare at night.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyePosh

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my skin...
customer_reviews.text: This formula actually made me break out.It had nothing in it that really fights acne and didn’t do anything to clean oil from face.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Jennon

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smelling
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleanser. The bottle is big and will last a long time. I have very sensitive skin, and this has not made me break out. It smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The best face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Scnetless, gentle face wash for super sensitive and dry skin! I have been using this for 5 months with the oil free scentless face moisturizer and my complexion has never been better. I suggest using the wash and lotion twice a day, when you wake up and before bed for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin dries out easily and can be reactive to fragrances, but this was perfect! I use it for my hands too since soap tends to dry me out
customer_reviews.author: Pets and love

customer_reviews.title: Curology dupe
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product as a replacement for the Curology cleanser. It feels very similar in consistency and doesn’t leave my face feeling dry. It’s great, I love it! My favorite thing about it is the fact it has 0 scent. That, and you get quite a bang for your buck. Definitely check this cleanser out of you want something that does the job and is cheap without compromising the quality of your skincare.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Not good for makeup removal
customer_reviews.text: Not good for removing makeup. Doesn’t foam and doesn’t rinse easily. I had to buy the foaming alternative and relegate this to a cupboard. If you want to wash a makeup-free face and have sensitive skin, this would be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Onelittledaisy

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I tried this product.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this because regular Neutrogena was too harsh on my skin. This is wonderful, my face is clearing up nicely and even my rosacea had gotten better. I suggest still moisturizing after but it's not a absolute must like with some harsher face wash products.
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It says for sensitive skin but it made me and my boyfriends face break out bad for weeks. Not for everyone. Also did not like the texture, it didnt even feel like it was "cleaning" at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Postula

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash. Very light
customer_reviews.text: Good facewash for a mid day wash. I have oily skin and it doesn't feel like it does it for me for a morning or night face wash, but feels about right for a after-gym wash or other light washes.
customer_reviews.author: Mia E.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended by my demonology office, they gave me some samples and love the scent, gently cleans face and keep my skin beautiful and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my dermatologist. Has a scent but it doesn't bother me. I usually prefer cleansers that foam, but this is a great cream cleanser. Doesn't make my skin feel greasy or anything. Removes make-up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Dementia

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to see if a gentle wash would be more effective then the harsh system he had been using. He feels that his overall skin seems better but still has some major areas of concern. We are going to stick with it for a while to see how his skin adjusts. He does like the smell and says his skin feels very clean after washing.
customer_reviews.author: A Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: No lather no cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This does not lather at all and my skin doesn’t feel clean after using it so I don’t know that it can legitimately be called a “cleanser”.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Gentle & Nondrying
customer_reviews.text: It’s very gentle, unscented, and washes off easily. I bought this so that my reddened face would feel soothed after my laser treatments for acne scars. I still use it. It’s not drying at all. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy21

customer_reviews.title: Not For Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it’s called Ultra Gentle. The second it touched my face it burned horribly. If you have sensitive skin, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E.

customer_reviews.title: Does not foam up, like all
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't any scent to this which I liked but this does not foam up at all making me question if it is working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by Self mag as top 10 cleansers I love this! Previously I used Cera Ve cleanser but they changed the formula which stung my eyes and face. I found this cleanser to be very mild.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hill

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a zero I would. I have rosacea so I thought this would be perfect for sensitive skin, and CLEARLY I was wrong. It made my face feel like it was burning off and my skin was on FIRE. Threw it away because I wasn’t able to return.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin like myself! Doesn’t really have much of a scent! But makes my face feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product overall. Perfect for when I dont have my curology cleanser on hand. While It doesn't make my skin feel as fresh as I'd like, it cleanses adequately without stripping chemicals or harsh perfumes. It is probably one of the best cleansers for the price for sensitive skin. If you have dry skin, follow up with a light moisturizer. Otherwise no moisturizer is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Star Fox

customer_reviews.title: A Simple YET GREAT Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT face wash for ALL skin types. Non-fragrant and so soft! I would highly recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Helps improve my skin texture, it is light to my skin and doesnt damage it thus leaving it moisturized every after wash
customer_reviews.author: Nova Jean Sperry

customer_reviews.title: too greasy
customer_reviews.text: Even when my skin is dry, I do not like the result of this facial cleanser, it leaves the skin too greasy and the feeling that it's not clean, in fact, the black spots of my nose returned.
customer_reviews.author: Casa Vera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So glad many daily times can be bought in Amazon Pantry. Makes shopping so much easier. Great product for teen acne. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CDN in Hong Kong

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle, lathers up very easy
customer_reviews.text: The wash has a very light, clean scent to it. I use this wash to prevent breakouts on my skin, after applying it, I immediately rinse my skin off. It has not dried my skin out, and it has always worked great from day 1. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I loovvvee this face wash! 10/10 recommend. It leaves my face so soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Wiktorowski

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Daily Facial Cleanser for Sensitive Skin, Acne, Eczema & Rosacea, Oil-Free, Soap-Free, Hypoallergenic & Non-Comedogenic Creamy Face Wash, 12 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Size:12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Cleanse skin and leave it feeling moisturized in just one step with Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser. Dermatologist developed for even the most sensitive skin, this effective, yet extraordinarily mild creamy face wash combines the superior cleansing of Neutrogena technology in a sensitive skin cleanser. With its unique skin-nourishing polyglycerin formula, this extra gentle facial cleanser cleanses even the most dry and sensitive skin, including skin with acne, eczema or rosacea. Our hydrating cleanser washes away oil, dirt, bacteria and makeup leaving skin feeling clean, moisturized and naturally soft. Daily face wash is uniquely formulated with minimal ingredients and is oil-, soap-, fragrance- and paraben-free. Clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skin, it is also hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and is free of allergens and irritating essential oils. Use this face cleanser wash in a daily skincare routine.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena
feature_bullets: 12-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser for sensitive skin effectively cleanses face while leaving skin feeling moisturized and naturally soft

Our extraordinarily mild creamy face cleanser helps thoroughly remove excess oil, dirt, bacteria and makeup and cleanses even the most dry and sensitive skin, including skin with acne, eczema or rosacea
Dermatologist developed daily face wash is formulated with minimal ingredients and is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic so it's gentle on skin and won't clog pores
Clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skin, our hydrating facial cleanser is oil-, soap-, fragrance- and paraben-free and contains no allergens or irritating essential oils

With its unique skin-nourishing polyglycerin formula, this hydrating creamy face wash cleanses skin and is ideal for sensitive and dry skin care It makes a great addition to a daily at-home skincare routine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
